bug.author: itikhono
bug.summary: as_type_ptr doesn't work for TensorIterator::Input/Ouput desc
bug.description:
Hi! I faced an issue that as_type_ptr doesn't work for this cast: TensorIterator::InputDescription to TensorIterator::SliceInputDescription, similar for another inputs/outputs descriptions. This issue occurs only on Win10 platform. Tested compilers: MSVC 17/19. The reproducer is here: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/NervanaSystems/ngraph/pull/3906>#3906</denchmark-link>
Could you please take a look?
